## vue-extra-decorators package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [and(fns)](./vue-extra-decorators.and.md) | Merges multiple predicates into one. |
|  [BProp(opts)](./vue-extra-decorators.bprop.md) | Declares a Vue property. Boolean flavor of [@Prop](./vue-extra-decorators.prop.md) decorator |
|  [Classes(prefix, infix, converter)](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) | Prefixes a css classes getter keys with a given prefix and adds a css class to its body. supports transforming object keys for conventional class names. |
|  [ClassesCamel(prefix, infix)](./vue-extra-decorators.classescamel.md) | Camel case specific flavor of [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) decorator. Prefixes a css classes getter keys with a given prefix and adds a css class to its body. transforms the class name to camelCase and all members to PascalCase. |
|  [ClassesKebap(prefix, infix)](./vue-extra-decorators.classeskebap.md) | Kebap case specific flavor of [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) decorator. Prefixes a css classes getter keys with a given prefix and adds a css class to its body. transforms the class name and all members to kebap-case. |
|  [ClassesPascal(prefix, infix)](./vue-extra-decorators.classespascal.md) | Pascal case specific flavor of [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) decorator. Prefixes a css classes getter keys with a given prefix and adds a css class to its body. transforms the class name and all members to PascalCase. |
|  [ClassesSnake(prefix, infix)](./vue-extra-decorators.classessnake.md) | Snake case specific flavor of [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) decorator. Prefixes a css classes getter keys with a given prefix and adds a css class to its body. transforms the class name and all members to snake\_case. |
|  [composeConverter(className, memberName)](./vue-extra-decorators.composeconverter.md) | Creates a key converter function for use in [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [Debounce(ms)](./vue-extra-decorators.debounce.md) | Debounce function calls by a specified amount of time The function will only be executed <code>ms</code> milliseconds after the last invocation. If it is invoked again within this timeframe, the timeframe is reset. Useful for search completion. |
|  [Debuffer(ms)](./vue-extra-decorators.debuffer.md) | Debuffer function calls by a specified amount of time The function will only be executed every <code>ms</code> milliseconds Every call within this timeframe are blocked and the timeframe reset. Useful for possible multiple event triggersn. |
|  [Delay(ms)](./vue-extra-decorators.delay.md) | Delay function calls by a specified amount of time. |
|  [DProp(opts)](./vue-extra-decorators.dprop.md) | Declares a Vue property. Date flavor of [@Prop](./vue-extra-decorators.prop.md) decorator |
|  [Every(ms)](./vue-extra-decorators.every.md) | Calls a function every <code>ms</code> milliseconds. |
|  [EveryFrame()](./vue-extra-decorators.everyframe.md) | Calls a function every animation frame. |
|  [If(fns)](./vue-extra-decorators.if.md) | Wraps a function and only calls through if a given set of predicates return truthy |
|  [IfNot(fns)](./vue-extra-decorators.ifnot.md) | Wraps a function and only calls through if a given set of predicates return falsy |
|  [isEqual(path, value)](./vue-extra-decorators.isequal.md) | Create a predicate that checks if the first parameter of the returned function is equal to a given value at a certain json path. |
|  [isFirstChild(ev)](./vue-extra-decorators.isfirstchild.md) | A predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is the first child of its parent node. |
|  [isFirstElementChild(ev)](./vue-extra-decorators.isfirstelementchild.md) | A predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is the first child element of its parent element. |
|  [isInPath(refs)](./vue-extra-decorators.isinpath.md) | Creates a predicate that checks if its first parameter (assumed event) has one or more given vue refs in its . |
|  [isLastChild(ev)](./vue-extra-decorators.islastchild.md) | A predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is the last child of its parent node. |
|  [isLastElementChild(ev)](./vue-extra-decorators.islastelementchild.md) | A predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is the last child element of its parent element. |
|  [isOneInPath(refs)](./vue-extra-decorators.isoneinpath.md) | Creates a predicate that checks if its first parameter (assumed event) has one or more given vue refs in its . |
|  [isOneOf(path, values)](./vue-extra-decorators.isoneof.md) | Create a predicate that checks if the first parameter of the returned function is equal to one of many a given values at a certain json path. |
|  [keyMatches(keys)](./vue-extra-decorators.keymatches.md) | Creates a predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is a key event matching one of a given set of keys. |
|  [LimitToFrames()](./vue-extra-decorators.limittoframes.md) | Limit function calls to browser frames. Useful for animations. Every subsequent call before the next frame is blocked. |
|  [mouseButtonMatches(buttons)](./vue-extra-decorators.mousebuttonmatches.md) | Creates a predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) is a key event matching one of a given set of mouse buttons. |
|  [NextFrame()](./vue-extra-decorators.nextframe.md) | Delay function calls by a single browser frame. |
|  [NextMs()](./vue-extra-decorators.nextms.md) | Delay function calls by a millisecond. |
|  [NextTick()](./vue-extra-decorators.nexttick.md) | Delay function calls by a vue tick using this.$nextTick. |
|  [not(fn)](./vue-extra-decorators.not.md) | Inverts a given predicate (negates its output) |
|  [NProp(opts)](./vue-extra-decorators.nprop.md) | Declares a Vue property. Number flavor of [@Prop](./vue-extra-decorators.prop.md) decorator |
|  [On(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.on.md) | Registers the decorated method as a vue event listener. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [OnDocument(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.ondocument.md) | Registers the decorated method as a dom event listener for the document object. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [OnElement(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.onelement.md) | Registers the decorated method as a dom event listener. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [OnParent(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.onparent.md) | Registers the decorated method as a vue event listener of the parent vue component. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [OnParentElement(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.onparentelement.md) | Registers the decorated method as a dom event listener for the parent vue component. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [OnWindow(events)](./vue-extra-decorators.onwindow.md) | Registers the decorated method as a dom event listener for the window object. if more than one event is given, it will listen for multiple events All event parameters are passed as arguments to the decorated method. |
|  [or(fns)](./vue-extra-decorators.or.md) | Merges multiple predicates into one. |
|  [Prop(opts, typeOverride)](./vue-extra-decorators.prop.md) | Declares a Vue property. |
|  [Route(route)](./vue-extra-decorators.route.md) | Registers a route for a given component Decorator for components |
|  [RouteName()](./vue-extra-decorators.routename.md) | Binds the current route name to a class member. Decorator for properties. On setting the decorated property, a navigation will occur to the set route name using . |
|  [RouteParam(name)](./vue-extra-decorators.routeparam.md) | Binds a route param to a class member. Decorator for properties. On setting the decorated property, a navigation will occur to the current route with new params using . |
|  [RouteQuery(name)](./vue-extra-decorators.routequery.md) | Binds a route query to a class member. Decorator for properties. On setting the decorated property, a navigation will occur to the current route with new query using . |
|  [SProp(opts)](./vue-extra-decorators.sprop.md) | Declares a Vue property. String flavor of [@Prop](./vue-extra-decorators.prop.md) decorator |
|  [wasPrevented(ev)](./vue-extra-decorators.wasprevented.md) | A predicate that checks if the first parameter (assumed event) was prevented with . |
